programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Stanton, Calif.; Darrell is banned from an auction; Ivy Calvin lands a cool machine; Jarrod and Brandi flip for a dancer; Barry goes under cover.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod hopes that scoring more lockers will prevent Brandi from closing the store in Long Beach; Ivy attempts to intimidate the other bidders; Rene's cockiness could prove to be a detriment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi attempt to stay focused on a big score as Dave returns with more bluster than ever; Ivy's treasure promises fun on the high seas.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura face tough competition in the neighborhood of North Hollywood; Dave's locker may be a hit; Mary eyes two units that, if purchased together, would make a perfect fit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders head to Rancho Cucamonga, Calif.; Ivy opens his wallet for the right locker; buyers Darrell and Brandon stay hungry.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary brings out a not-so-secret weapon as the gang invades North Hollywood, Calif.; Dave takes an unusual gamble; Jarrod and Brandi look for choice merchandise; Rene aims high.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers seek industrial merchandise and antiques; a wine rack intrigues Jarrod and Brandi; Dave and Barry put their knowledge of oddities to the test.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Perris, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi bid on a unit filled with power tools and potential; Darrell brings along a fleet of trucks to haul away his anticipated high-volume purchases.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The new bidder returns; Barry is intrigued by a locker with a hole in the wall; Jarrod pulls a sneaky trick.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Long Beach, Calif., where Darrell manages to turn a profit and Barry finds a unique race car.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A torrential storm in Santa Cruz, Calif., leaves some buyers soaked; quilts brighten up Dave's rainy day.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Santa Ana; Barry Weiss makes a purchase; Dave Hester has trouble leaving; one buyer makes a magic find.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bargain hunters roll into Tustin, Calif., fellow bidders make things difficult for Jarrod and Brandi; Jeff makes record profit on a low-price locker; Barry and Kenny try to sideswipe Dave.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders travel to San Jacinto, Calif.; Darrell makes a musical purchase; Brandi and Jarrod must team up with Barry in order to turn a profit; Nabila attempts to expand her territory.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders peruse lockers in Mission Viejo, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi uncover an unusual piece of art; Barry's accountant tries to keep him in check.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene and Casey display their confidence by arriving with a caravan of trucks; Darrell hopes to distract his competitors with doughnuts; Jarrod and Brandi plan an anniversary party for their store.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Mogul's Return!
programme.desc: Ivy makes money at an auction in Montclair; Darrell finds something that will launch him to new heights; Brandi worries that a hangover will compromise Jarrod's buying; Dave returns.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: A Very Miraculous Storage Wars Christmas
programme.desc: The buyers remain competitive while attending a white elephant gift exchange at Dan and Laura's house, with the event's proceeds going to charity.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi hope a special guest can sniff out the best lockers in West Covina, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon help their colleagues dress for success; Mary looks for vintage items.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave makes his colleagues struggle when they return to his stomping grounds of Santa Ana, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi are off their game; Ivy crashes the festivities and faces new bidding rivals.
